## Online Pause Menu (Quit Online Races/Battles)

This code makes it so you can pause the game when playing online and quit at anytime. Quitting will return you to the main online menu without having to reconnect. Note that you will lose VR/BR when quitting, so use this code with the Don't Lose VR/BR When Disconnecting code (by Bully).

Works in Worldwides, Regionals, Friend Rooms and even in Live Views!

<details>
<summary>NTSC-U</summary>

